info.name: REST API Examples (Integration Development Guide)
info.description:
This collection contains examples from the [REST API Examples](https://help.acumatica.com/Help?ScreenId=ShowWiki&pageid=bbb8b84b-07d7-4a69-adf8-33dc5d430b60) chapter of the Integration Development Guide of Acumatica ERP.

**Testing the Requests**

To test the examples, you configure this collection and the Acumatica ERP instance to be used as follows:

- Deploy a new Acumatica ERP instance with three tenants that are based on the U100, SalesDemo, and T100 datasets. For details on deploying an instance, see [To Deploy an Acumatica ERP Instance](https://help.acumatica.com/Help?ScreenId=ShowWiki&pageid=b18ad378-0a8c-44f1-a14c-6b4f9c6271e4) in the Installation Guide.
    
- Specify the base URL of the site in the _BaseURL_ variable of the collection.
    
- Specify the instance URL in the _InstanceURL_ variable of the collection.
    
- Make sure the URL of the Default/24.200.001 endpoint is in the _EndpointURL_ variable.
    
- Make sure the URL of the MANUFACTURING/24.200.001 endpoint is in the _ManufacturingEndpointURL_ variable.
    
- Specify the tenant name, branch, username, and password to access the tenant with the U100 data in the _TenantU100_, _BranchU100_, _UsernameU100_, and _PasswordU100_ variables.
    
- Specify the tenant name, branch, username, and password to access the tenant with the T100 data in the _TenantT100_, _BranchT100_, _UsernameT100_, and _PasswordT100_ variables.
    
- Specify the tenant name, branch, username, and password to access the tenant with the T100 data in the _TenantSalesDemo_, _BranchSalesDemo_, _UsernameSalesDemo_, and _PasswordSalesDemo_ variables.
    

Other variables are used by particular requests and are specified during execution of other requests. You do not need to feel their values manually.
